chapter.title: Map
chapter.para: The Map view is were you geotag your images.

sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: Map view will show you a world map and pin images that is geotagged into the map, there are several processes to get this happen, some cameras have an internal gps that tags images with location data such as smartphones, other cameras such as DSLR needs some additional GPS component to do this.

Darktable however supports GPX tracks data to be applied onto images, this mean as while you are on a walk and uses the right app on your smartphone that have GPS functionality thats records your walking track, and whil on that track you are taking images with your camera, the timestamp of images taken can be matched into the track data log and therefor a location can be estimated.
